name: rFactor 2
description:
Presenting rFactor, the racing simulation series from Image Space Inc. After creating more than dozen products in the previous ten years, ISI took the next logical step, creating a completely new technology base and development process. This new isiMotor 2.0 environment became the foundation on which many exciting products were built for years to come.

The second title, rFactor 2, introduced upgraded graphics and a truly dynamic racing environment for the first time. Continuing to support third-party mods, ISI also freely provide users with more in-house content and software updates.
